title: The 20 best teams in Europe: according to Uefa coefficient - Football
text:
Previous slide Next slide 1 of 21 View All Skip Ad 
Uefa's coefficient system uses the performances of teams over the last five seasons to give each a score by which to rank them. 
Wins, draws and progression in the Champions League is worth the most points, while Europa League success is given slightly less weighting. A season spent outside Europe, meanwhile, is worth almost nothing. 
Here, we rank the 20 best teams in Europe according to Uefa's coefficient, with some surprising inclusions. PA/AP/Getty Images
